TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CngKey extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class CngKey Implements IDisposable
public ref class CngKey sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 定义用于下一代加密技术 (CNG) 对象的密钥核心功能。

span.span: Defines the core functionality for keys that are used with Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包装 NCrypt 密钥，不 BCrypt 密钥。This class wraps NCrypt keys, not BCrypt keys. NCrypt 是 CNG 提供密钥存储功能的子集。NCrypt is a subset of CNG that provides key storage functionality. BCrypt 是提供基本加密服务，例如随机数生成、 哈希函数、 签名和加密密钥的子集。BCrypt is a subset that provides base cryptographic services such as random number generation, hash functions, signatures, and encryption keys.

An ephemeral key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载创建没有名称，这意味着该密钥是暂时的键 （也就是说，它不会保留）。This overload creates a key without a name, which means that the key is ephemeral (that is, it will not be persisted). 它还创建一个默认对象，它指定默认和密钥的其他高级的参数。It also creates a default object that specifies a default and other advanced parameters for the key.

span.span: is .

span.span: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
All other errors.

summary.span: 移除与对象相关联的密钥。

span.span: Removes the key that is associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 当调用方法上一个暂时的密钥，它将关闭项的句柄。When you call the method on an ephemeral key, it closes the handle to the key. 当调用方法命名的密钥，删除已命名的密钥后，不再可以使用对象。When you call the method on a named key, the object can no longer be used after the named key is deleted.

exception.span: 尝试访问已删除的密钥。

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: 将密钥材料以指定的格式导出到 BLOB 中。

span.span: Exports the key material into a BLOB, in the specified format.

returns.span: 一个包含指定格式的密钥材料的 BLOB。

span.span: A BLOB that contains the key material in the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下一代加密技术 (CNG) 允许基础密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 支持的任何格式导出。Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) allows export in any format that the underlying key storage provider (KSP) supports. 例如，在 Windows Vista 上，默认的 KSP (即) 仅允许导出私钥存放在， ，和格式。For example, on Windows Vista,the default KSP (which is ) only allows export of private keys in the , , and formats. 此限制由基础 KSP 控制。This restriction is controlled by the underlying KSP. 如果你使用不同的 KSP，可以应用其他格式。If you use a different KSP, other formats may apply.

span.span: is .
All other errors.

exception.span: 通常情况下， 不允许导出密钥。

span.span: Typically, the does not allow the key to be exported.

span.span: Gets a property, given a name and a set of property options.

returns.span: 一个包含指定属性的原始值的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the raw value of the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的用途是属性的返回的任意项的值。The purpose of this method is to return the value of an arbitrary property of the key. 若要检索属性的典型方法是通过使用提供的属性访问器的搜索类。The typical way to retrieve properties is by using the property accessors provided by the class. 提供多个，但并非所有属性的包装。 provides wrappers for several, but not all, properties. 方法主要用于访问未包装的属性的值。The method is primarily used to access the value of a property that is not wrapped. 此方法是在以下情况下有用：This method is useful in the following cases: - 新版本的操作系统支持一个新的下一代加密技术 (CNG) 密钥属性，不具有包装。A new version of the operating system supports a new Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) key property that does not have a wrapper. - 你将自定义属性添加到该密钥。You add a custom property to the key. `options`参数专门用于表示以下：The `options` parameter is specifically used to indicate the following: - 属性是内置的或自定义。Whether the property is built-in, or custom. - 是否应保持与键。Whether the property should be persisted with the key. 这些选项必须与匹配的属性已设置，也未找到的属性的值。These options must match the value that the property was set with, or the property will not be found. 如果找不到该属性将引发。 is thrown if the property cannot be found. 应调用方法首先以避免异常，而不是包装方法调用`try/catch`块。You should call the method first to avoid the exception instead of wrapping the method call in a `try/catch` block.

span.span: is .
All other errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的句柄是在当前的句柄的重复对象。The returned handle is a duplicate of the handle in the current object. 它将保持不变即使当前被释放，于是必须单独的释放。It will persist even if the current is disposed, and must be disposed of separately. 你可以释放当前对象，而无需任何负面影响的任何顺序的句柄。You can release the current object and the handle in any order without any adverse effects.

span.span: Creates a new key by importing the specified key material into the specified key storage provider (KSP), using the specified format.
A new key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 Windows 7 和 Windows Server 2008 R2 之前的 Windows 操作系统，不支持某些 CNG 密钥的二进制大型对象 (BLOB) 格式。On Windows operating systems before Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2, some CNG key binary large object (BLOB) formats are not supported.

summary.span: 获取密钥的持久性状态。

span.span: Gets the persistence state of the key.

value.span: 如果密钥是暂时的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the key is ephemeral; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定密钥是否是暂时的 （即，密钥仅在存在的句柄的生存期），或保持 （即，存在该密钥，独立于句柄）。This property determines whether the key is ephemeral (that is, the key exists only for the lifetime of the handle), or persisted (that is, the key exists independently of the handle). 返回的值取决于用于获取密钥的方法：The return value depends on the method that is used to obtain the key: - 如果密钥不用打开方法重载中，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 正在管理密钥，并且可以确定它是否是临时。If the key was not opened by the method overload, the common language runtime (CLR) is managing the key and can determine whether it is ephemeral. - 如果密钥用打开方法重载中，CLR 不能确定它是否是临时。If the key was opened by the method overload, the CLR cannot determine whether it is ephemeral. 因此，假定密钥是要保留。Therefore, the key is assumed to be persisted. 但是，如果此方法用于打开由 CLR 创建的密钥的句柄，CLR 将能够确定它是否是临时。However, if this method is used to open a handle to a key that is created by the CLR, the CLR will be able to determine whether it is ephemeral. 此属性不具有公共 setter;它是只读的。This property does not have a public setter; it is read-only.

span.span: if the key is available on a machine-wide basis; if the key is only for the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载使高级的用户使用的 CNG 类，即使它们依赖于平台调用或 c + + 的托管互操作功能。This overload enables advanced users to use the CNG classes even if they rely on platform invoke or the managed interop capability of C++. 例如，如果你有返回 NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE 形式的键的本机库，此重载允许您创建的托管的包装密钥并使用 CNG 类来对其进行操作。For example, if you have a native library that returns the key as an NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE, this overload lets you create a managed wrapper around the key and use the CNG classes to manipulate it. 通过使用其句柄打开某个键时，你不能确定密钥的暂时状态，必须自己指定它。When you open a key by using its handle, you cannot determine the key's ephemeral state and must specify it yourself. 几个属性类依赖于此值是否正确。Several properties of the class rely on this value to be correct. 因此，请确保传递到正确的标志值方法。Therefore, make sure that you pass the correct flag value to the methods.

span.span: is .

span.span: is invalid or malformed, or it is already closed.

summary.span: 获取或设置窗口句柄 (HWND)，该句柄应该用于由访问密钥而产生的用户界面 (UI) 提示。

span.span: Gets or sets the window handle (HWND) that should be used for user interface (UI) prompts caused by accessing the key.
The parent window handle for the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用密钥的父窗口句柄 UI 提示，如智能卡 PIN 提示。The parent window handle for the key is used in UI prompts, such as smart card PIN prompts. 此值不会与持久性密钥一起保存。This value is not persisted with persisted keys. 我们建议你始终设置此属性对于显示用户界面的密钥。We recommend that you always set this property for keys that display a user interface. 不使用的默认值`null`对这些密钥。Do not use the default value of `null` for such keys.

summary.span: 获取密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 的一个本机句柄 (NCRYPT_PROV_HANDLE)。

span.span: Gets a native handle (an NCRYPT_PROV_HANDLE) to the key storage provider (KSP).
A handle to the KSP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的句柄是在当前的句柄的重复对象。The returned handle is a duplicate of the handle in the current object. 它将保持不变即使当前被释放，于是必须单独的释放。It will persist even if the current is disposed, and must be disposed of separately. 你可以释放当前对象，而无需任何负面影响的任何顺序的句柄。You can release the current object and the handle in any order without any adverse effects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法，可通过将新的自定义属性添加到现有密钥对象。This method enables you to add a new custom property to an existing key by using a object. 设置上的选项对象必须完全匹配中的选项调用。The options set on the object must exactly match the options in the call. 否则，该属性将不会找到。Otherwise, the property will not be found.

span.span: Gets parameters that control the user interface (UI) for accessing the key.

value.span: 一个包含用于显示 UI 的配置参数的对象。

span.span: An object that contains configuration parameters for displaying the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密钥的用户界面策略用于 UI 提示如智能卡 PIN 提示。The key UI policy is used with UI prompts such as smart card PIN prompts. 此策略还控制受保护密钥的密码对话框。This policy also controls password dialog boxes for protected keys.

An alternate name for the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取访问密钥时，可以使用的备用名称。This property gets an alternate name that can be used when accessing the key. 如果原始的密钥名称未能唯一标识保存的密钥，你可以使用此属性。You can use this property if the original key name does not uniquely identify the persisted key. 属性将返回为此属性的密钥的文件名。The property will return the file name of the key as this property. 返回的名称依实现而定。The name returned by the is implementation-dependent.
